  2. I want to learn to add timers, from the above example fishing spots, I want to make it so that when you click something it has a delay and then dose the stuff like mining a rock, I want to learn how to add timers so that you have to wait a few seconds before you successfully get the ore.

  3. I want to know how you would make it so like if you were to click an object it would delete it then after a while (probally using timers) the object would respawn: if you need a visual I want to do that with my Cabbage case:
